Articles.Content:
Sorry guys if this has been asked already (it probably has, but I haven't found it). I've been away from the forums and the game for a couple of months, and have just recently had the urge to start playing again. My only question being that if I start building something in 0.25 will it transfer to 0.90?

Thanks in advance.
most probably - they're not doing the huge game ovehauls they used to.

most probably - they're not doing the huge game ovehauls they used to.

So Squad hasn't confirmed or denied it?

The answer is: This is alphabeta, do not expect save files nor craft files to work between versions. Only way to get a definitive answer is to try it yourself, if they happen to work then good for you.

AFAIK there's been no official word on whether 0.25 (or earlier) ships or saves will be properly compatible with 0.90.0.

On the other hand, we do know that the strut and fuel line parts were completely rewritten, so I certainly wouldn't bet on it this time.

sorry guys if this has been asked already (it probably has, but i haven't found it). I've been away from the forums and the game for a couple of months, and have just recently had the urge to start playing again. My only question being that if i start building something in 0.25 will it transfer to 0.90?

Thanks in advance.

why the heck would you even post this!!!!

Now you have me worried!

Stupid jerk!. Now im going to be freaking out if craft files will transfer.

Jerk move.

This is one question that would have been better to stay in your head or ask someone in a pm.

Gahhhh!!!!!!

It would have been better for me to find out from squad than have to be kept awake at night wondering what all I am going to have to fix

Especial sense I pretty much just finished my PG-25 Griffin

I am assuming if they add stats and abilities for Kerbals, strut and fuel lines altered, I believe I read somewhere the way fuel flows will change all could cause issues with .25 and earlier vehicles and current missions.

Kerbals on a mission may not have the training or ability to EVA, pack chutes, etc.

Certain designs may have fuel issues if they change fuel lines and the rules of how fuel is consumed. Struts could also be an issue.

I would expect some issues to pop up with saves.

I will rage quit ksp if it breaks all my craft files.
